name: test_syntax.vim
description: Just an example of a syntax file uploaded to vim online - the actual script is empty. I just wanted to show how you can use vimonline.
install_details: Here is where I would describe how users should install the script. This is an example of a reference to a tip: vimtip #23. This is an example of a reference to a script: vimscript #24. You can also use vimtip#23 and vimscript#44 (no space).
